column5: Got this one at the grand river sataurday went back in to become a turnament winner some day
Yupper.  Some friendly advice...edit/remove your post, save yourself a bunch of grief. Oh, yeah (on a lighter note) edit/remove that hat too
...and where exactly does it say that?  Though I agree, the shots in the grass of an OOS fish are in bad taste...not to mention the hat...
Luckily this time of year the water is still cold, I'm sure that did zero harm to the fish..    Bass are pretty resilient.

This topic has been brought up quite a bit over the time ive spent on this site.  I thought we all came to the conclusion that it is ok to snap a quick picture and release the fish.  That being said, the pics on the grass we probably could have done with out.  And the Hat is great BTW

Fish was out of the water for for less then a min I was fishing with an my eleven year old son it was biggest bass he had seen seen so he asked if we could take a picture if anyone one has a problem go fly a kite
I think some folks need to chill, just a wee bit.
